WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thanks for reporting this. We're considering this for a next release.
WorkItem.Description:
this.Method1();


When you hovered over Method1 the tooltip shows only " ()->void" without jsdoc.

You get the jsdoc only when clicking between the paranthesis.

This is annoying.
WorkItem.Summary: Jsdoc and intellisense in vs 2012 not quite perfect
